comment: L'Amrique se tient avec la France.
amr:
# ::snt L'Amrique se tient avec la France.
(t / tient-of
      :ARG1 (c / city
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "L'Amrique"))
      :ARG3 (c2 / country
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "France")))

comment: Mslmanl ayaklar altna alp alay ederken bu konumu kafalilar byle tepkiyi gosterdinizmi ok bilmisler..
amr:
# ::snt Mslmanl ayaklar altna alp alay ederken bu konumu kafalilar byle tepkiyi gosterdinizmi ok bilmisler..
(a / and
      :op1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mslmanl"))
      :op2 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Alay"))
      :op3 (p3 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Alay"))
      :op4 (p4 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Ederken"))
      :op5 (p5 / person
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Kafalilar"))
      :op6 (p6 / person
            :name (n6 / name
                  :op1 "Hindi"))
      :op7 (p7 / person
            :name (n7 / name
                  :op1 "Gosterdinizmi"))

            :name (n8 / name
                  :op1 "Bilmisler")))

comment: Basn ve dnce zgrln, insanl desteklediinizi grmek ok gzel.
amr:
# ::snt Basn ve dnce zgrln, insanl desteklediinizi grmek ok gzel.
(a / and
      :op1 (h / have-purpose-91
            :ARG2 (w / work-of-art
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Basn")))
      :op2 (h2 / have-purpose-91
            :ARG2 (w2 / work-of-art
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Dnce"
                        :op2 "Zgrln")))
      :op3 (h3 / have-purpose-91
            :ARG2 (w3 / work-of-art
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Deklediinizi")))
      :op4 (h4 / have-purpose-91
            :ARG2 (w4 / work-of-art
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Ok"
                        :op2 "Gzel"))))

comment: ulan zndklar ayn hassayite daha gn nce ehit olan polis iin niye yapmadnz munafklar...
amr:
# ::snt ulan zndklar ayn hassayite daha gn nce ehit olan polis iin niye yapmadnz munafklar...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "States")))
            :ARG1 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 p))
      :snt2 (h2 / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (n2 / nigger
                        :mode expressive)
                  :op2 (e / ehit
                        :mode expressive)
                  :op3 (p2 / polis
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Llan")))
                  :op4 n2
                  :mode expressive)
            :op5 (m2 / munafklar
                  :mode expressive))
      :ARG2 (h3 / here))
